definitions.definition: Painstaking and careful not to miss or omit any detail .
examples: The Prime Minister announced a thorough investigation into the death of a father-of-two in police custody.
Not enough! Your work has to be thorougher than this.
It's the most thorough artwork I have ever seen!
The infested house needs a thorough cleansing before being inhabitable again.

main_definition: Painstaking and careful not to miss or omit any detail .
